original_text: And they were not able in the presence of the people to catch him in what he said, but marveling at his answer they became silent.
korean_text: 그들이 백성 앞에서 그의 말을 능히 책잡지 못하고 그의 대답을 놀랍게 여겨 침묵하니라

sentences.original_text: And they were not able in the presence of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 백성 앞에서 할 수 없었으니

sentences.original_text: to catch him in what he said
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 말씀으로 그를 잡을 수 없었다
